overview: What do you say fellas...ready to blast off? Words to live by, according to six blissfully reckless friends who come together for a lost weekend wedding reunion of drinking, bowling, fighting, snorting, puking, screwing, writing bad novels, getting spanked by a psychotic preacher, hailing extraterrestrials and finally...learning that it takes more than a few days to achieve total world domination.
tagline: They were young. They were angry. They were stupid.
title: The Deviants
